website_summaries.verdict: With no weight limit, anyone can add these sliders to a customized workout routine.
pros: Noted to stand the test of time and hold up after several workouts
Ideal for those on the go who don't have the luxury of routine workouts, but still want to fit them in
High notes for the padding size that eases the stress placed on one's body
cons: May not work on rough textured surfaces

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the carrying bag that came with them - added ...
customer_reviews.text: Recently got these and wanted to put them through several workouts before giving a review. I absolutely love the carrying bag that came with them - added bonus which makes it easier for me when traveling. The sliders are very well made and I have loved adding them into my routine to intensify specific exercises. Great option when traveling to bump up the intensity without a bunch of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R.

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used for working out, but are great for moving furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Although I originally purchased these for working out, I've never really used them... However, the other day I had to move some furniture, and these work great! Put them under one side of what you'd like to move and voila! Easy peasy. Moved a whole entertainment center with a 60" TV and a desk without needing help or having to take anything off. Would recommend and buy again, just for moving furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Bestest_Name_Ever

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome on all types of floors. Good quality. Thin cushion on fabric side.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't layout a template for these discs to get a visual on the size. they are smaller than I'd like. They are fine for the hands but challenging to keep the feet on them when I'm using a set for hands AND feet simultaneously. Seems like no manufacture makes a larger size. Not sure why. Good quality though and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael DiBenedetto

customer_reviews.title: Great for whole body workout!
customer_reviews.text: I instantly loved these....the color drew me in...it’s so pretty!! These are a really great size...not too big like others I’ve tried, and they are so easy to use, but don’t worry...you will definitely get a great workout in! Use them with your hands too...not just your feet! Travel bag keeps them organized and together, which helps me!
customer_reviews.author: Becki Neuman

customer_reviews.title: Great for any surface!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sliders! They’re great to use on any surface (hardwood, tile, carpet, etc!), and the small size makes them perfect for travel! My only issue was the grip, I did have some issues with slipping off of the sliders with certain exercises. But other than that, this is an amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Grace Snider

customer_reviews.title: Tightens, Stretches and helps Tone-up
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Just the fact that it helped with stretching, I was hooked. U can feel the burn. They can be used in so many ways. I’ve been using them to tighten my abs and work on my legs and man can I feel the burn and muscle aches the next day. Don’t over do it the first time, if you don’t exercise regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabet

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my Chicmoda sliders
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Chicmoda sliders. They are not too slippery and stay on my feet as i am moving where as some sliders I have used in the past slip off my feet. I am very happy with my purchase!! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Ana Giraldo

customer_reviews.title: Needs Improvement
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd like these gliders because they are smaller and more compact than others I've used. Unfortunately, the size makes them a little less functional (like using one for both feet), and they are not as slippery as I would like. I like that they have a little carrying pouch, and being small, they travel well. But I will be getting larger ones next time.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great on carpet and hardwoods
customer_reviews.text: I started working out over FaceTime with a trainer. This was one of the items she had me buy for our sessions. I hate this so much because it works so well. It glides like butter when I do lunges and mountain climbers on carpet. My legs hurt so good. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal & Quality
customer_reviews.text: Shipped great. Company sent a thank you note with information to contact them in case I was unsatisfied with my purchase. Quality of discs are great-especially for the price. I think they are better than ones I’ve seen going for double the price. I purchased to use for my ‘tone it up’ app workouts and they work great. Super happy.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Glides like butter
customer_reviews.text: I use these 4 times a week and they are great. I live in a older apartment with carpet and these make working out much easier. They glide smoothly on carpet. I can now do mountain climbers with minimal impact on my feet and less noise for the neighbor living below me. Also great for core exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Good gliders
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for [solidcore] videos and online classes. They work well with my carpet and hardwood floors, though difficult to figure out at first. I wish it came with instructions and sample workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Maite Rubio

customer_reviews.title: save your money
customer_reviews.text: Well, after reading the hit or miss reviews, I ordered anyway. It is a miss. They really do not slide. I also fear I may scratch my floor with them as they make a crunching sound. Maybe if I cover them with coconut oil? LOL
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Threw them out after a week
customer_reviews.text: These worked OK on carpet, but scratched up my basement flooring. Useless to me, since my basement gym doesn't have carpet. These are essentially the same thing as the furniture slides you can buy. Don't recommend them for fitness at all!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine A.

customer_reviews.title: For the price it was okay
customer_reviews.text: It's not a perfect slide, then again the really good ones that have the little wheels underneath are $50 or higher. It works better on wood flooring, for the price is not bad, however it could be a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica5M

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Getting a real workout with these. An I absolutely LOVE the color as well. Matches description. I appreciate the thank you note. I value the product more when companies make an effort to show their customers that they care. So Thank you Chic-Moda for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: travis johnson

customer_reviews.title: workout in my room MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: I have been working out a lot more in the room with our new quarantine lifes. I have carpet, these work amazing for the slow sculpt workouts I've been doing. ***Those paper plates weren't cutting it anymore lol. Love the color Love the way my feet stay on good price ...and they coming with a cute bag highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Oelke

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed because it is obvious that the sliders do not work on all carpet. I asked before purchasing and was told they do work on carpet. I am guessing, not all carpet. Unfortunately, I have not been able to use. Money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Dee

customer_reviews.title: Fabric side is PERFECT on stone floors
customer_reviews.text: We have slate floors throughout our home. I purchased these since one side is smooth plastic and the other is fabric. The fabric side works like a dream on our stone floors. The plastic side also works but will definitely scratch up quickly on our stone floors. Definitely a great buy that will help me take my quarantine routine to the next level!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sliders!
customer_reviews.text: Great sliders! I like the black cushion. They look like higher quality than the ones I see on my Beachbody workouts. I love the color! They make working out a little fun, but don’t be fooled because they’re challenging!
customer_reviews.author: P. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Sliders I’ve Ever Seen!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy I decided to order these sliders! They are perfect! I have hardwood floors and the soft side of the sliders work very well! It’s AWESOME that I can use these both on carpet and hard floors so it makes them perfect for traveling or to take to the gym/home. I love the color options and it comes with a bag to put them in! 5/5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria G

customer_reviews.title: Core workout
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Been looking for a good core exercise to work with. This is a good replacement for socks and towels lol! The pouch bag is very close convenient as well.
customer_reviews.author: Crish

customer_reviews.title: Quick Workout
customer_reviews.text: I use these for a quick workout at home. Who ever thought I could slide my to a toned body. At first, my husband giggled so I ask him to try the same exercises I found on YouTube. The giggles ended.
customer_reviews.author: nameme

customer_reviews.title: Too thin, not happy
customer_reviews.text: Too thin. Can’t use on the carpet, doesn’t glide easily through the carpet and stoping. Also not very easy to slide on the vinyl plank floor either . My feet constantly come off of them.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use/beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: This is the 1st time I've used sliders since exercising with my virtual obe membership. Perfect to use with pilates and barre classes. One side for carpering and the other for floors.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Cute carrying bag
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy duty and light weight sliders. No assembly required, ready to use as soon as you open the package. They worked well in plank position on my wood floors. They come with a cute carrying case for storage/travel!
customer_reviews.author: Aminah

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was using pieces of cardboard on a tiny area of hardwood in my home. These make it to where I can do my mountain climbers on any carpeted area. Love the carry bag it came with as well. This is definitely going to be a part of my daily home workout routine.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Don't be foiled by the cheap price
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to start exercising at home, so I purchased these. There was too much traction and not any resistance. I will be returning them. That's too bad, because I loved the coloring.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: dont bother
customer_reviews.text: doesnt really help with easier movement, doesnt glide very well on carpet, and just a bit better on hardwood. stick to your regular workout methods
customer_reviews.author: S-K

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and product.
customer_reviews.text: I used something similar to this with my trainer and bought one for home. The product is high quality and is a great addition to my workout.
customer_reviews.author: GCD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the home or travel workout
customer_reviews.text: These are similar to my purple Gliding discs at the gym. These are made for both carpet or hardwood floors. Just flip it on the side you need. I use them for lunges and core exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Not for hardwood floors that you care about
customer_reviews.text: The listing says for all flooring however if you use these on hardwood you will damage your floors. I will most likely out a towel under them at which point I could have just bought two floor towels.
customer_reviews.author: d.thomas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality at a SUPER reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the pricier slides! I also love the drawstring storage bag! Keeps them clean and so much easier to store or pack for travel. Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Fair product
customer_reviews.text: These arrived on time and are very simple to use. I docked a star because upon arrival there’s a small knick on the side of the slides. They still work so it’s no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Brier

customer_reviews.title: Loving these gliding discs :)
customer_reviews.text: I love these sliders (and the carrying case! I have been using them for a couple weeks now and they really enhance my workout by making it more challenging and therefore much more effective :) I'm a yoga teacher and stretch all the time of course- they even help me with my front and middle splits. I recommend! ~Erica
customer_reviews.author: Erica Barreiro

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: They slide with ease on carpet with the plastic side down. Pretty scratched up after the first use. But hey that’s what they’re for lol
customer_reviews.author: Chandra Worley

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I use these for our home work outs and it works just like it's intended to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Jen B

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves these
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughter and simply put she loves them . That is all I needed to know.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: That the item gets the job done..regardless of the fact that the cushion is thin!
customer_reviews.text: The cushion is a bit thin..but otherwise..this does what I need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Works on a variety of floors!!
customer_reviews.text: Aas not convinced they would work on carpet but they do!!! These are perfect for exercise
customer_reviews.author: Amy Prestidge

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use with Openfit Pilates and they do the job and are a very cute color.
customer_reviews.author: Tami B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value workout gliding discs!
customer_reviews.text: I love these discs! I Since they are dual sided, I can use them anywhere for my home workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Challenging but possible
customer_reviews.text: Use these in my home gym, great for strength training while staying low impact
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Worked well on my carpet, wouldn’t use on a hard floor and would probably be easiest on a thick carpet.
customer_reviews.author: The Novel Eater

customer_reviews.title: I love these sliders
customer_reviews.text: I love these sliders! First of all, the color. I'm sorry but I'm a sucker for pretty things. These things slide like a dream on my living room carpet where I tried them out and I can't wait to use them in my PIYO workout!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra L Helmes

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as shown. Sliders are good quality and it shipped quickly! All good!
customer_reviews.author: LaVerne

customer_reviews.title: Not super smooth
customer_reviews.text: These don’t move super smooth on my carpet. Hard to use because of that.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Love the color, but more importantly they work great on carpet!
customer_reviews.author: ElleRey

customer_reviews.title: Not for extremely slippery floor
customer_reviews.text: The product is exactly as described and is good quality but it seems my floor is extremely slippery because them doesn’t work. I cannot get the support needed for some yoga and pilates exercises, I keep sliding. I guess is not product fault but I would need something rougher!
customer_reviews.author: ap_diazt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Based on the description of the item, what I received was exactly what I was expecting. :) The discs work well. I’ve used them on both carpet and tile. No complaints! The use of them have certainly benefited my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Slider Option
customer_reviews.text: I havent tried these out on carpet yet, but for wood floors, these are great sliders. I've been doing more slider-based workouts at home in quarantine and these are great for replicating the Lagree Fitness type moves I did at studios!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for me. Very difficult to slide on carpet or hard floors.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a low price
customer_reviews.text: Work great, the same as more expensive brands, comes in a case.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Rines

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I use this at the gym for core day.
customer_reviews.author: Arnie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t slide.
customer_reviews.text: Really cute sliders that don’t slide. I have nothing but carpet in my room and these don’t slide on it.
customer_reviews.author: Lala Fitness Life

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I haven’t used them as much as I wanted to, but I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Love it

customer_reviews.title: Cute but doesn't slide well
customer_reviews.text: The color is very cute but they don't slide nearly as well as they should
customer_reviews.author: rko

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good product wish it came with covers so I could use it on hard wood.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Challenging and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to the bands by the same company. Perfect for a home workout.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Work great and cute color. Comes in a little pouch. I’ve used on carpet and hardwood floor and they slide perfectly on both.
customer_reviews.author: AlexH

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like these but not exactly what i expected, but i didn't pay attention in my ordering. I wanted sliders to have the mesh throughout with only a hard outer edge around them. These have mesh on only one side and a hard shell on the opposite side - which scratches every time i use them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Craig

customer_reviews.title: These are great and super affordable
customer_reviews.text: These work great on carpet - and were twenty dollars cheaper than another brand I was considering. I really like the color too
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: If you have not tried sliders yet in your workout, you have got to! They are amazing, who would have thought these little things would give such a great workout?! These are so affordable & I loved the color, so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Simmons

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Use them for sliding hands and feet during palaties workout.
customer_reviews.author: Sabra Fair

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, will add into it if anything changes
customer_reviews.author: Johannah Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sliders helps me a lot with core work. The only thing I thought should have been improved is that there should be a strap at the top to secure you feet or hands
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Corrian

customer_reviews.title: Got my sliders in the mail and I LOVE them! For one thing the green color is ...
customer_reviews.text: Got my sliders in the mail and I LOVE them! For one thing the green color is so fun, but more importantly they work great! I prefer using the smooth side down on the carpet...gets some great strength training moves in! Love the carrying case it comes with too!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Design change needed
customer_reviews.text: It is a good slider, i would consider to change a little bit the size to easy manage. For the price it is fine
customer_reviews.author: Aurora Rangel

customer_reviews.title: An alert
customer_reviews.text: Great product and it challenges my abs in various ways.
customer_reviews.author: Adventurous

customer_reviews.title: Durable and handy
customer_reviews.text: We use these disc for core and stair climbing exercises. My feet keeps sliding off whenever I try to go too fast.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sliders they are so pretty! They are made well and I have used them everyday for the last month. They have held up to my crazy workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Tian Scheer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These disks are great! Lightweight and easy to travel with !
customer_reviews.author: Gary Harris

customer_reviews.title: Works on all flooring.
customer_reviews.text: Using sliding discs really works the core. It’s important that the discs can slide easily. These discs do! On both carpet and non-carpeted areas.
customer_reviews.author: J. Graddy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It moved easily on my tiled floors and the carrying case comes in handy when I am traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Rutal

customer_reviews.title: He color is super cute
customer_reviews.text: These arrived so quickly. They have comfortable black padding and a nice smooth surface to be able to workout on your rug. Just be sure your carpet is flat and hard.
customer_reviews.author: VHCreations

customer_reviews.title: Great for home workouts.
customer_reviews.text: These worked perfectly for my home workouts. Sometimes they slide out from under my foot, but that typically only happens when I am tired and not focused on my form and keeping it there. I used mine on stained concrete surface and put the soft side down. Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Bagwell

customer_reviews.title: Small and simple
customer_reviews.text: Small and simple to use and carry around. Non impact in use.
customer_reviews.author: S. R. Miramon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: They do not slide easily on carpet or wood floor. I bought a set for home and the office and can’t use either set. The carpet in my office is low to no pile. I’m very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy K. Tinnish

customer_reviews.title: “A” plus!
customer_reviews.text: Fun workout pretty good quality no qualms. Arrived very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for my ab workouts
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my ab workouts! They are durable and have a fabric side and a smooth side that glides easily across the floor. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Ash

customer_reviews.title: Product came very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I use these at my gym and I am working out from home and these are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Saimeri-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these ! Must buy and love the color
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that they had 2 sides and can be used depending on the floor you have: carpet or hardwood floor. The color is bright and nice too. They came in a bag for travel. I am very happy with those gliding discs!
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice

customer_reviews.title: GREATEST SLIDERS
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sliders! The best I ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Argento

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome discs. They don’t slip off like other gliding discs. I love the mint color. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: HappyGilmore24

customer_reviews.title: Just use socks
customer_reviews.text: Too small and feet slip off should of sent them back and just use socks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for building core strength, a must-have in a home gym or for working out at home. Excellent quality and the carrying bag is great. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jay S Moore

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great,just remember to wear rubberized socks or tennis shoes so your feet don’t slip off the sliders
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: I love them!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my discs yesterday and I love them! Slide across the floor very nicely and the padding size is very nice and comfortable! Looking forward to using them everyday!! Thank you Chicmoda!!
customer_reviews.author: Chadra

customer_reviews.title: Work great on any surface.
customer_reviews.text: These sliders are great.. My body weight workouts are at a new level.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sliders.
customer_reviews.text: Slide well on carpet. Exactly as I thought they’d be.
customer_reviews.author: L. Emenopy

customer_reviews.title: super cute & get the job done
customer_reviews.text: The color of these sliders was what initially caught my eye. :) They work really well. Would buy again if I needed an extra set.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well with carpet.
customer_reviews.text: These did not work well with my carpet as other people mentioned that they did. I specifically bought them to workout in my living room and it didn’t go well so I will probably not being using them.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: The product doesn’t slide as easy across my carpet as other products I’ve used. Still works
customer_reviews.author: Sara Heldmann

customer_reviews.title: Sliders for Hard surfaces
customer_reviews.text: These disc are great for hard-smooth floors/surfaces I had a more difficult time using them on my living room rug (where I usually workout). But no big deal the friction just calls for a tougher workout.
customer_reviews.author: lamjooo

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Cute color, slides very easily on turf & carpet. Fits easily into my backpack for the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Good workout
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color and the way it was packaged. It is very easy to use and it does the job. It really works for ABs and balancing
customer_reviews.author: Lizeth T. Ruelas

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Made work out easier scratched floors a bit but have to try it in carpet overall had be sweating during mountain climbers
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: These disks clearly had been used. There were brown scratch and dirt marks where someone had used them before.
customer_reviews.author: ashleigh webber

product_meta.title: CHICMODA Gliding Discs Core Sliders, Dual Sided Disks Fitness Equipment for Abdominal, Home Exercises to Strengthen Core, Glutes, and Abs, Used on Carpet or Hard Floors with Carry Bag
feature_bullets: Gliding Discs For Exercise: the fitness core sliders can tone, sculpt and challenge your abs, chest, arms, legs and shoulders with slide pads. Lunges, planks, pushups and any other workouts traget to strengh training, stretch of whole body

Dual Sided For Any Surface: smooth side made of shock resistant plastic work on carpet, rugs or cloth surfaces; the fabric side works on hard wood, laminate or tile floors let you do exercises at any place

Portable and Lightweight: the exercise sliders are light, small and compact (7" in Diameter), with a carry bag, easy to pack for travel, to the gym or stay at home to make your daily body building continuously and more convenient

2-Pack for Different Fitness Levels: fit for both men and women, professional sports person, sports enthusiasts, slimmers or beginers to imporve fitness, get a full-body workout at any time with this sliders

Guarantee: Chicmoda Gliding Discs an ideal exercise equipment for any place, add more benefit to bodyweight workouts. Our Worry-Free 12-Month Product Guarantees, and Friendly Customer Service. Customer Satisfaction is Our First Priority.
